name: UIStatusBarAnimation
desc: Constants that specify the animation of the status bar as it's hidden or made visible.

items.name: case none
items.desc: No animation is applied to the status bar as it is shown or hidden.

items.name: case fade
items.desc: The status bar fades in and out as it is shown or hidden, respectively.

items.name: case slide
items.desc: The status bar slides in or out as it is shown or hidden, respectively.
